text:
In applying Sec l3(b)(l7) the exemption
shall be deemed applicable even though some nonexempt work is performed by the
employee during the workweek, unless the amount of such nonexempt work is
substantial. The amount of nonexempt work will be considered substantial if it
occupies more than 20% of the time worked by the employee during the workweek.
(See IB 786.200)
